text:
add global group support to email templates or at the very least copy n paste group support between templates.

I have to reproduce the same footer in 8 drag n drop email templates and cant use global groups, it’s going to take like an hour and a half to do what I could do in 2 minutes with global groups
we won’t be adding more jQuery versions. Instead, we’ll be removing the included jQuery entirely so you can include whatever you want.
created idea forum post for this: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Allow-creation-of-global-groups-in-email-templates/idi-p/252121#M29371>

HubSpot Email dev team - would be nice if the image module for email code were adjusted  - the style attribute for the image should be `max-width:{{module.img.width}}; width:100%;` The reason for this is because if you don’t do it, outlook will display the images at the wrong size.

making that small change will fix emails for everyone
`:yourang:` (wish that was an emoji, ref the Addams Family)
That _may_ already be fixed in the new rendering engine we have for the beta drag and drop email editor, leave it with me :+1:

sounds good and if you need any more details on it mailchimp has a writeup on why it works the way it works.

<https://templates.mailchimp.com/development/responsive-email/fluid-images/>
